name: VOCES8

location.name: Koerner Hall, Royal Conservatory of Music

description:
The Grammy Award-nominated English a-cappella octet returns for another extraordinary Christmas concert.

Touring globally, VOCES8 performs an extensive repertory both in its a cappella concerts and in collaborations with leading musicians, orchestras, conductors, and soloists. Versatility and a celebration of diverse musical expression are central to the ensemble's performance and education ethos which is shared both online and in person.

The Arts Desk proclaims "VOCES8 are the Rolls-Royce of British a cappella ensembles".

Please join us! This concert is preceded by a short performance by talented students of The Royal Conservatory.

name: Dom We Now Our Gay Apparel
description:
Dominick Pupa, nightclub sensation and cohost of the hit podcast "FixingFamousPeople", makes his Toronto debut with his acclaimed annual show, skewering of the year that was. 

It's a pop culture roasting with holiday music parodies that will ruin the Christmas classics for you forever.

name: Kensington Market Winter Solstice
description:
Ignite the longest, darkest night! Join the community for the 35th annual celebration featuring an intimate evening performance series that highlights the works of local artists in music, theater, storytelling, and spoken word.

Handmade lanterns will be available for purchase at the event for $25.

name: Celebrate Christmas: An Evening of Glory and Peace
description:
Looking for a meaningful way to celebrate Christmas?

Join us for a Christmas Evening Service led by our English congregation and open to the entire community. All are welcome!

The evening will include music, Scripture, and reflection focused on the Christmas message of glory, peace, and hope, celebrating the birth of Jesus Christ.

name: Unveiling Unsalted
description:
Unsalted Films is a Filipino-led independent film team based in Toronto. 

Join us in celebration of team's body of work, including their latest full Tagalog short film "Pagpag", which has been selected to represent Toronto at Filmapalooza 2026 in Portugal. This special evening brings together industry guests, creatives, and community members for film screenings, and networking while raising funds to support this Filipino-Canadian filmmakers on the international stage.

Supporters can participate through sponsorship, becoming a vendor, purchasing tickets, or sharing the event within their networks.

name: Angela's Christmas: Ukrainian Magic Night
description:
Join us for a warm and soulful Christmas gathering led by the dazzling Angela Daily and hosted by Isadora Savage.

This special evening brings together the Ukrainian community and all guests who seek holiday magic, comfort, and music from the heart.

Enjoy Ukrainian Christmas songs in modern arrangements, theatrical elements from Kolo Fashion, and a festive atmosphere filled with warmth, tradition, and celebration.

A night of music, culture and togetherness, all in one intimate holiday experience.

name: Queer Brazilian Brunch: Christmas Edition
description:
Join us for a festive brunch celebrating Brazilian culture, it's going to be a jolly good time!

Come ready to indulge in some tasty Brazilian dishes and exotic fruit caipirinhas by Geladona in partnership with the Brazilian bakery Padaria Toronto.

Whether you're a long-time member of the LGBTQ+ community or a supportive ally, everyone is welcome to join us for this special event.

Live music by local talented musicians.
